<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Astonishing Explosion](/Feats.aspx?ID=1241) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Additive 2" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=4" />
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=7" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet](/Sources.aspx?ID=36) pg. 72</row>

**Frequency**
once per minute

**Trigger**
You use [Quick Alchemy](/Actions.aspx?ID=2) to craft an [alchemical bomb](/equipment/alchemical-items/alchemical-bombs) that deals [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage and is at least 2 levels lower than your advanced alchemy level.

</column>

---

Your bomb incorporates an explosive spark of wonder that leaves witnesses dumbfounded. Any target hit by your Strike with the bomb is [fascinated](/Conditions.aspx?ID=14) by you for 1 round. On a critical success, the target is also [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36).

<title level="2">Capstone Feats</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet](/Sources.aspx?ID=36) pg. 72</row>

Characters who have reached 20th level can choose from the following feats, representing the pinnacle of mortal power influenced by their triumphs.

**Related Feats**: [Annihilating Swing](/Feats.aspx?ID=1240), [Banishing Blow](/Feats.aspx?ID=1242), [Denier of Destruction](/Feats.aspx?ID=1243), [Endurance of the Rooted Tree](/Feats.aspx?ID=1244), [Mimic Protections](/Feats.aspx?ID=1245), [Reclaim Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=1246), [Reflecting Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=1247), [Ringmaster's Introduction](/Feats.aspx?ID=1248), [Steal Essence](/Feats.aspx?ID=1249), [Tenacious Blood Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=1250), [Verdant Presence](/Feats.aspx?ID=1251)
name: Astonishing Explosion
